about_the_game:
Numina:Construct is a fast-paced 3D Shoot 'Em Up that combines intense action with strategic mechanics. With dynamic camera changes, stylized environments, and challenging boss fights, each level offers an immersive experience. Customize your ship and select from a diverse arsenal to face waves of enemies in battles where every decision counts.

Mechanics

  • Defend: Face your enemies intelligently using polarity shields. These shields allow you to block projectiles of the same color, making timing and quick reflexes essential. Manage their use carefully, as you’ll be vulnerable when shields go into cooldown. How you anticipate attacks will determine whether you stay strong or find yourself defenseless in the middle of battle.

  • Attack and Destroy: Explore a diverse arsenal of weapons and adapt your playstyle to the situation. Choose powerful, slow weapons for destructive force, or pick rapid-fire options for consistent, high-speed attacks. Each weapon offers unique abilities and properties, allowing you to personalize your approach in every battle. Implement the strategy that best fits your combat instincts to dominate your enemies.

  • Move and Dodge: Master the art of dodging with strategic movement. Maneuvers allow you to evade enemy fire in critical moments, though they require precise control to avoid collisions at the end of each move. Additionally, use "Precision Movement" to navigate tricky situations with a closer camera view, allowing for more controlled movement. Whether you prefer to live on the edge or take a cautious approach, the key lies in how you manage the space between you and imminent danger.

  • Master Every Angle: As the action intensifies, dynamic camera angles immerse you in the battle, automatically switching between vertical, horizontal, and third-person perspectives. These strategic changes let you face each challenge from a new angle, testing your ability to adapt and maintain control at all times. With every unexpected twist, you'll need to adjust your maneuvers and tactics to survive the bullet frenzy. Don’t lose sight of your goal and prove your mastery in every scenario!

Customize

  • Make It Yours: Add a personal touch to your ship by choosing from a wide selection of aesthetic designs and customizable colors. Whether you prefer a subtle look or something bolder, you have the freedom to express your personality as you navigate the skies. Your ship will not only be powerful but also reflect your unique style in every battle!

  • Tailored Arsenal: Take your customization further with a variety of weapons, each with special abilities that can turn the tide of combat. Whether you choose powerful, slow weapons or fast, consistent shots, each weapon has its own identity. Pick the armament that best suits your playstyle and use its unique abilities to dominate the battlefield.

Features 

  • Choose Your Difficulty: From intense challenges for experienced players to accessible options for newcomers, adjust the difficulty of each level so everyone can enjoy the experience at their own pace.

  • Score Challenge: Push your limits! Increase your score by mastering each level with precision. The higher the difficulty, the greater the reward, but beware: every mistake will cost you, and being destroyed will lower your final score.

  • Destroy Bosses: Prepare to face powerful final bosses! These titans unleash devastating attacks in already challenging levels, testing your skills to the max in order to survive.

  • Atmospheric and Stylized Environments: Navigate through vibrant, immersive worlds where every environment is designed to pull you deeper into the action and make you feel like you're in an authentic galactic battle.

  • Support for Mouse, Keyboard, and Console Controllers: Play your way with full support for multiple control options, ensuring the best possible experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 | 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 2 GB | AMD Radeon R7 360, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Dodge, defend, and destroy! Engage in a frenetic shoot 'em up, facing relentless bullet streams that test your reflexes. Experience dynamic shifts between vertical and horizontal views as you fend off endless enemy waves. Use polarity shields for defense and strike back fiercely. Conquer the chaos!
